vertexTranslator_afterInsWeight - Variable in class gen.Hyperparams
the weight for INSERT-BETWEEN transitions with p = right
vertexTranslator_articleLmWeight - Variable in class gen.Hyperparams
In the language model score, we divide by the number of words, but articles are not counted as full words, but instead weighted with this factor.
vertexTranslator_articleSmoothing - Variable in class gen.Hyperparams
a smoothing factor added to the probabilities of denominators
vertexTranslator_beforeInsArgWeight - Variable in class gen.Hyperparams
the weight for INSERT-BETWEEN transitions with p = left if the edge connecting σ1 and β1 is a PropBank core role (ARG0 - ARG5)
vertexTranslator_beforeInsWeight - Variable in class gen.Hyperparams
the weight for INSERT-BETWEEN transitions with p = left if the edge connecting σ1 and β1 is not a PropBank core role (ARG0 - ARG5)
vertexTranslator_defaultRealizationScore - Variable in class gen.Hyperparams
the probability assigned to default realizations
vertexTranslator_lmWeight - Variable in class gen.Hyperparams
the weight for the language model term in the score function of our model
vertexTranslator_realizationWeight - Variable in class gen.Hyperparams
the weight for REALIZE transitions
vertexTranslator_reorderingWeight - Variable in class gen.Hyperparams
the weight for REORDER transitions
